system.description: Your ranged attacks ignore the AC bonus granted to targets by cover (except total cover).
system.prerequisites: Point Blank Shot, Precise Shot, base attack bonus +11
system.benefit: Your ranged attacks ignore the AC bonus granted to targets by cover. Only total cover provides a benefit; targets with less than total cover get no benefit from cover against your attacks.
system.special: A fighter may select Improved Precise Shot as one of his fighter bonus feats.
